_description: Database MCP server configurations. Copy the relevant section into your .mcp.json

setup_commands.postgresql: claude-platform mcp add postgres --api-key DATABASE_URL -- npx -y @bytebase/dbhub
setup_commands.mysql: claude-platform mcp add mysql --api-key DATABASE_URL -- npx -y @bytebase/dbhub

notes.postgresql: You will be prompted to enter DATABASE_URL securely (e.g., postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/db)
notes.mysql: You will be prompted to enter DATABASE_URL securely (e.g., mysql://user:pass@host:3306/db)
notes.sqlite: No API key needed - SQLite uses a local file path
